info.title: ControlService API
info.description: The `ControlService` plugin provides the ability to manage the remote controls of a STB.

enableOpenChime.summary: Whether the open chime is enabled

enableCloseChime.summary: Whether the close chime is enabled

enablePrivacyChime.summary: Whether the privacy chime is enabled

canFindMyRemote.summary: Checks if the Control Manager can search for the remote.

findLastUsedRemote.summary: Searches for the last used remote.

events.onControl: Triggered when the last used remote is successfully found

stbRf4ceMACAddress.summary: The STB MAC address for the RF4CE network

stbRf4ceShortAddress.summary: The STB short address for the RF4CE

stbNumPairedRemotes.summary: The number of remotes paired to the STB

stbNumScreenBindFailures.summary: The number of screen bind failures for the STB

stbLastScreenBindErrorCode.summary: The last screen bind error code on the STB

stbLastScreenBindErrorRemoteType.summary: The remote type for the last screen bind error on the STB

stbLastScreenBindErrorTimestamp.summary: The last screen bind error timestamp on the STB

stbNumOtherBindFailures.summary: The number of other bind failures on the STB

stbLastOtherBindErrorCode.summary: The last other bind error code on the STB

stbLastOtherBindErrorRemoteType.summary: The remote type for the last other bind error on the STB

stbLastOtherBindErrorBindType.summary: The last other bind error bind type on the STB

stbLastOtherBindErrorTimestamp.summary: The last other bind error timestamp

batteryLastEventTimestamp.summary: The timestamp of last battery event (in milliseconds)

numVoiceCommandsPreviousDay.summary: Number of voice commands the previous day

numVoiceCommandsCurrentDay.summary: Number of voice commands the current day

numVoiceShortUtterancesPreviousDay.summary: Number of short voice commands the previous day

numVoiceShortUtterancesCurrentDay.summary: Number of short voice commands the current day

numVoicePacketsSentPreviousDay.summary: Number of voice packets sent the previous day

numVoicePacketsSentCurrentDay.summary: Number of voice packets sent the current day

numVoicePacketsLostPreviousDay.summary: Number of voice packets lost the previous day

numVoicePacketsLostCurrentDay.summary: Number of voice packets lost the current day

aveVoicePacketLossPreviousDay.summary: Average number of voice packets lost the previous day

aveVoicePacketLossCurrentDay.summary: Average number of voice packets lost the current day

numVoiceCmdsHighLossPreviousDay.summary: Number of voice commands exceeding packet loss threshold the previous day

numVoiceCmdsHighLossCurrentDay.summary: Number of voice commands exceeding packet loss threshold the current day

versionInfoIrdb.summary: The IR database version of remote

programmedTvIRCode.summary: The IR code programmed for TV

programmedAvrIRCode.summary: The IR code programmed for AVR

lastCommandTimeDate.summary: The time when last key was pressed

bHasCheckedIn.summary: `true` if the remote has checkedin for update and `false` otherwise

bHasRemoteBeenUpdated.summary: `true` if the remote's firmware is updated and `false` otherwise

bIrdbDownloadSupported.summary: `true` if the IR database download is supported and `false` otherwise

lastRebootErrorCode.summary: The error code for previous reboot (in milliseconds)

bHasBattery.summary: `true` if remote has battery and `false` otherwise

batteryChangedTimestamp.summary: The time of battery change (in milliseconds)

battery75PercentTimestamp.summary: The timestamp when battery was 75% (in milliseconds)

battery50PercentTimestamp.summary: The timestamp when battery was 50% (in milliseconds)

battery25PercentTimestamp.summary: The timestamp when battery was 25% (in milliseconds)

battery5PercentTimestamp.summary: The timestamp when battery was 5% (in milliseconds)

batteryVoltageLargeJumpCounter.summary: Number of large voltage jumps in battery

batteryVoltageLargeDeclineDetected.summary: `true` if large voltage decline in battery is detected, otherwise `false`

bHasDSP.summary: `true` if remote has digital signal processor and `false` otherwise

averageTimeInPrivacyMode.summary: Average time in privacy mode (in milliseconds)

bInPrivacyMode.summary: `true` if remote is in privacy mode and `false` otherwise

endOfSpeechInitialTimeoutCount.summary: Initial time out count after end of speech

endOfSpeechTimeoutCount.summary: Time out count after end of speech

getLastKeypressSource.summary: Returns last key press source data. The data, if any, is returned as part of the `result` object.

timestamp.summary: The timestamp of last key press (in milliseconds)

bIsScreenBindMode.summary: `true` if screen bind mode is ON and `false` otherwise

getLastPairedRemoteData.summary: Returns all remote data for the last paired remote. The data, if any, is returned as part of the `result` object.

batteryLastEventTimestamp.summary: The timestamp of last battery event (in milliseconds)

numVoiceCommandsPreviousDay.summary: Number of voice commands the previous day

numVoiceCommandsCurrentDay.summary: Number of voice commands the current day

numVoiceShortUtterancesPreviousDay.summary: Number of short voice commands the previous day

numVoiceShortUtterancesCurrentDay.summary: Number of short voice commands the current day

numVoicePacketsSentPreviousDay.summary: Number of voice packets sent the previous day

numVoicePacketsSentCurrentDay.summary: Number of voice packets sent the current day

numVoicePacketsLostPreviousDay.summary: Number of voice packets lost the previous day

numVoicePacketsLostCurrentDay.summary: Number of voice packets lost the current day

aveVoicePacketLossCurrentDay.summary: Average number of voice packets lost the current day

numVoiceCmdsHighLossPreviousDay.summary: Number of voice commands exceeding packet loss threshold the previous day

numVoiceCmdsHighLossCurrentDay.summary: Number of voice commands exceeding packet loss threshold the current day

bHasDSP.summary: `true` if remote has digital signal processor and `false` otherwise

bInPrivacyMode.summary: `true` if remote is in privacy mode and `false` otherwise

endOfSpeechInitialTimeoutCount.summary: Initial time out count after end of speech

endOfSpeechTimeoutCount.summary: Time out count after end of speech

getSingleRemoteData.summary: Returns all remote data for the specified remote. The data, if any, is returned as part of the `result` object.

batteryLastEventTimestamp.summary: The timestamp of last battery event (in milliseconds)

numVoiceCommandsCurrentDay.summary: Number of voice commands the current day

numVoiceShortUtterancesPreviousDay.summary: Number of short voice commands the previous day

numVoiceShortUtterancesCurrentDay.summary: Number of short voice commands the current day

numVoicePacketsSentCurrentDay.summary: Number of voice packets sent the current day

onXRConfigurationComplete.summary: Triggered on control manager configuration complete event

onXRPairingStart.summary: Triggered on control manager validation/pairing key press event

onXRValidationComplete.summary:
Triggered on control manager validation/pairing end event.  
Validation status codes:  
* `0` - VALIDATION_SUCCESS   
* `1` - VALIDATION_TIMEOUT  
* `2` - VALIDATION_FAILURE  
* `3` - VALIDATION_ABORT  
* `4` - VALIDATION_WRONG_CODE
